hero.title: Transform Your Digital Future
hero.description: 20+ years of international expertise in digital transformation, from Oracle enterprise systems to founding a $5M+ software agency. I help organizations bridge enterprise governance with startup agility.

about.title: About Baptiste Leroux
about.subtitle: Executive IT Leader & Global Delivery Expert
about.intro: With 20+ years of international experience, I bridge the gap between enterprise governance and startup agility, helping organizations scale their digital capabilities globally.
about.backgroundText: I founded and scaled StarTechUp Inc. from a 4-person startup to a 50-person international software agency generating $5M+ revenue. This journey taught me the critical balance between rapid growth and sustainable operations, giving me unique insights into both entrepreneurial agility and enterprise-scale challenges.
expertiseItems: Executive IT Leadership: Proven P&L responsibility for $5M+ technology operations
Global Team Management: 11 years managing 50-person offshore operations across Asia
SaaS Product Development: 50+ solutions delivered across finance, insurance, IoT, and B2C platforms
Cultural Bridge Expertise: Seamless coordination between European, American, and Asian business cultures
Digital Transformation: From Oracle enterprise systems to modern cloud-native architectures
about.approachText: I combine hands-on technical expertise with executive-level strategic thinking. Having built and scaled teams internationally, I understand both the operational challenges of global delivery and the strategic imperatives of digital transformation. My consulting approach focuses on practical, implementable solutions that deliver measurable business value.
credentialsItems: Scaled operations across 10+ countries with proven cultural expertise
Generated $5M+ revenue through technology solutions and team scaling
Managed 100+ successful project deliveries with enterprise and startup clients
Proven track record in both B2B and B2C SaaS product development
